name: merge-queue-init
description: handles a merge queue initiation with github actions

scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -am 'chore: add dist action'
scripts.commit:push: npm run commit && npm run push
scripts.release:patch: npm run commit && npm version patch && npm run push
scripts.release:minor: npm run commit && npm version minor && npm run push
scripts.release:major: npm run commit && npm version major && npm run push
